title: Buffalo David Bitton Men's Slim Boot King Jeans
description: FASHIONABLE JEANS FOR MEN: These men’s bootcut jeans deliver casual comfort and trendy style. They feature a regular rise, a bootcut leg with a flared silhouette, 5-pocket styling, belt loops, a zipper fly, and single-button fastening.

THE RIGHT FIT: These designer jeans for men are made from a high-quality fabric and have a slim fit through the thigh with the right amount of stretch. They come in a variety of washes with unique detailing and distressing.

EASY TO WEAR: These stylish men’s jeans are great for pairing with a dressy button-down shirt or your favorite T-shirt. To keep these jeans and their colors fresh, machine wash them in cold water and tumble dry or hang dry.

FASHION THAT MOVES US FORWARD: We make sure our garments are versatile so they have a minimized impact on the world we live in during their life cycle. Wash them only every 8–10 wears to help reduce planet impact and extend their life.

SINCE 1972: Buffalo has always seen denim as a means of expression. We dress you from the “bottoms up” with the perfect fits, finest fabrics, and timeless washes and use responsible practices. This is who we are. We are Denim.
Buffalo David Bitton BM22720 Jeans Slim Fit Bangladesh Womens Zip-fly Slim 98% Cotton.2% Elastane Back Pocket(s)||Front Pocket(s) Woven Mid-Rise All Seasons Medium Weight Casual Modern
